mapper.insert: insert into user (id, username, password, realname, userType, sex, birthday, phoneNumber, email, gmtCreate, gmtModify, dr ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dr,jdbcType=BIT} )

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userType = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmtCreate = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmtModify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userType = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmtCreate = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmtModify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from user where username=#{username} and password=#{password} limit 1
select count(*) from user where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from user
and username like #{username}

select
from user where id=#{id} and password=#{password} limit 1
